## 1. Data Cleaning

```{r}
# Extracting the general data for mapping
addRepo("geanders")
data("hurr_tracks")
data("rain")
```

```{r}
# Filtering target data
earl_track <- hurr_tracks %>% filter(storm_id == "Earl-2010")
```
